name: Edimax EU-4208 100 Mb/s Ethernet USB Type-A Network Adapter
Features: [Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP / 2000 / Vista / 7, Mac OS X 10.x, RAM: Embedded 20KB SRAM for RX and 20KB SRAM for TX packet buffering, No external power adapter required, Low power consumption in idle mode and low traffic conditions., The Edimax EU-4208 USB 2.0 Fast Ethernet Adapter is specifically designed to give Fast Ethernet connectivity to your ultrabook, or any computer without an Ethernet port.]
